    • org.cauli.server中HttpResponse的使用

      返回HttpResponse的org.cauli.server中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      HttpResponse HttpResponse.charset(Charset charset)
      For text based responses, sets the Charset to encode the response as.
      HttpResponse HttpResponse.chunked()
      Turns the response into a chunked response

      after this method is called, write(String) should be used to send chunks
      HttpResponse HttpResponse.content(byte[] content)
      Write binary based content back to the client.
      HttpResponse HttpResponse.content(ByteBuffer buffer)
      Write binary based content back to the client.
      HttpResponse HttpResponse.content(String content)
      Write text based content back to the client.
      HttpResponse HttpResponse.cookie(HttpCookie httpCookie)
      Adds a cookie
      HttpResponse HttpResponse.end()
      Marks the response as ended.
      HttpResponse HttpResponse.error(Throwable error)
      Marks the response as erroneous.
      HttpResponse HttpResponse.header(String name, Date value)
      Adds a Date (RFC 1123 format) HTTP header.
      HttpResponse HttpResponse.header(String name, long value)
      Adds a numeric HTTP header.
      HttpResponse HttpResponse.header(String name, String value)
      Adds an HTTP header.
      HttpResponse HttpResponse.status(int status)
      Sets the HTTP status code.
      HttpResponse HttpResponse.write(String content)
      Writes immediately to the client without closing the connection.
      参数类型为HttpResponse的org.cauli.server中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void HttpHandler.handleHttpRequest(HttpRequest request, HttpResponse response, HttpControl control) 
      void HttpControl.nextHandler(HttpRequest request, HttpResponse response) 
      void HttpControl.nextHandler(HttpRequest request, HttpResponse response, HttpControl control)
